snippet: Terry Jones, the controversial pastor from Florida, has angered Iranian politicians, with one calling for Jones’s execution.
abstract: Terry Jones, controversial pastor from Florida, sets fire to several copies of the Koran, angering Iranian politicians; Jones says he is protesting the imprisonment of Iranian pastor Youcef Nadarkhani, who converted to Christianity.
lead_paragraph: Terry Jones, the controversial pastor from Florida, has angered Iranian politicians, with one calling for Jones’s execution.

headline.main: Iran Denounces Florida Pastor Over Koran Burning
